rules.name: Mission Tactics
rules.lore: Thousands of years of collated strategic data and hard-won combat experience have provided the Deathwatch with the ultimate battlefield tactics to combat almost any foe.
rules.text: At the start of each Battle Round, select one of the following Mission Tactics to be active for your army until the end of the Battle Round.

options.name: Furor Tactics
options.lore: When the enemy horde grows close, the Deathwatch will be tasked with the decimation of their core.

options.name: Malleus Tactics
options.lore: Even the largest behemoth has a weak point, and the archives of the Deathwatch number them all.

options.name: Purgatus Tactics
options.lore: The Deathwatch focus their deadly ire upon the commanders of the enemy host, assassinating them one after another.

rules.name: Kill Teams
rules.lore: When faced with an array of missions to complete and varying enemies to lay low, the Deathwatch are highly adept at forming effective kill teams that mesh starkly diverse armour and equipment.
rules.text: Attacks which target your +Kill Team+ units use the Toughness trait of the majority of models in the unit. If two or more Toughness traits are tied, use the better Toughness trait.

strategems.name: Armor of Contempt
strategems.when: Immediately after an enemy unit has declared a Ranged or Melee attack
strategems.effect: Until the end of the Battle Round, your unit has +1 to its Saving Rolls.

strategems.name: Teleportarium
strategems.when: At the end of a Battle Round
strategems.target: Up to two +Kill Team+ units from your army, or one +Adeptus Astartes+ unit from your army.
strategems.effect: Remove the selected units and place them in Reserves. They may be deployed during the next Battle Round.

strategems.name: Adoptive Tactics
strategems.when: At the start of a Battle Round
strategems.target: Up to two +Kill Team+ units from your army, or one +Adeptus Astartes+ unit from your army.
strategems.effect: Select a Mission Tactic. That Mission Tactic is active for the selected units until the end of the Battle Round, instead of the Mission tactic active for the rest of your army.
